name: Space Adventure (itch) (Bigsean109)
description:
Space Adventure takes place on a distant planet where you're an alien robot created by a lone wolf scientist, that wants to test you out and gives you an objective to go collect the stars. It's all just for protocol to make sure your system is working properly..but beware of the Asteroid belt that is near by

"Note the load level decided to not work after working for a while, so you'll have a part two for game play to get the feel for my prototype"
